data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Rangamati. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rangamati, Chittagong, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Rangamati
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 797 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Rangamati, Chittagong, Bangladesh a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the county.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, help the 747 believers in Rangamati to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 595,253 lost friends and neighbors.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Rohingya people.
Jesus, call those who are far off in Rangamati, Chittagong, Bangladesh, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Rangamati.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 747 believers in Rangamati against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

location.name: Rangamati
